definitions.definition: A transliteration of the Russian surname Бре́жнев ( Bréžnev ) ; usually refers to the Russian revolutionary and Soviet Secretary of the Central Committee of the CPSU(b) Leonid Brezhnev .
A transliteration of the Ukrainian surname Бре́жнєв ( Bréžnjev )

main_definition: A transliteration of the Russian surname Бре́жнев ( Bréžnev ) ; usually refers to the Russian revolutionary and Soviet Secretary of the Central Committee of the CPSU(b) Leonid Brezhnev .
secondary_definitions: A transliteration of the Ukrainian surname Бре́жнєв ( Bréžnjev )
